mdRecord.dcterms:title: Felt purse and contents
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cadet Nurse Corps purse; contents include: mirror, bobby pin, Revlon lipstick, cufflinks with insignia of US Navy Medical Corps, epaulet from the uniform of Norma Waldbauer, insignia of Annie Lucile, and New Testament belonging to Nancy Jane Davis (Inside cover: "University of Virginia School of Nursing, December 29, 1944"). Contents of purse belonged to Davis Tisdale-Harrison Waldbauer. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Handbags
